Detailed Description

Our own ToolTip widget which uses KHTMLView to display the tooltip.

Author:
The BibleTime team

QWidget *const CToolTip::parentWidget (    )  const
 

Returns the widget this tooltip applies to.

This tooltip widget is destroyed when he parent is deleted.

void CToolTip::tip (  const QPoint &    p,
const QRect &    rect,
const QString &    text
)  [protected]
 

This function shows a tip with the given text.

The tooltip will open at the position p on the screen. When the mouse moves out of the rectangle rect the tooltip will disappear. The point p must be in the rectangle rect, otherwise the behaviour of CToolTip will be incorrect!
